About Zachary Auerbach

I am a passionate software engineer that never gives up. I have strenght vigilance and grit. I tackle any problem or obstacle with logic and reasoning. I will never give up until a solution has been found. I look forward to the oppurtunities, that await me in the future. It would be a pleasure and a honor to help my clients reach their goals and dreams. Just as I did. There is nothing stopping anybody from anything except ourselves. I will change the world with dynamic solutions for dynamic world issues. One line of code at a time.
